questions_and_notes: why does this variable have depth0m, but fgco2-Oyr doesn't?  I think depth0m should be removed because the standard_name already provides this information.
specific_issues: 2:Modify dimensions.  Add or remove scalar coordinate.

long_name: Surface Downward Mass Flux of Carbon as CO2 [kgC m-2 s-1]
comment: Gas exchange flux of CO2 (positive into ocean)
